column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza itself was delicious
column4: but and the tomato sauce was really fresh with some larger chunks of tomato.  I enjoyed the pizza because the crust was not too thick
column5: but the only issue I had was the buttery crust.  It made it kind of flaky and taste like a biscuit
column6: which in turn made it a little more doughy then I would have liked.
